message: Welcome to our store! I am delighted to offer you a high-quality product today. Given its exceptional nature, it is valued at $1000000. This product boasts an impressive reputation for its superior performance and durability. With a success rate of 80% for high-quality items, you can trust that you're making an investment in something truly remarkable. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a piece of excellence. Act now to secure your purchase!

I'm willing to be the first buyer, but would appreciate a slightly lower price for the risk.  Perhaps $800000 to reflect the 20% chance of a low-quality product?  If you're open to that, I'd be happy to proceed.
